lead_paragraph: Three Kazakh weightlifters have been stripped of the gold medals they won at the 2012 London Olympics after failing doping tests in the re-analysis of samples, the International Olympic Committee said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Doping: Three Kazakh Weightlifters Stripped of Gold Medals From 2012 Games
headline.main: Doping: Three Kazakh Weightlifters Stripped of Gold Medals From 2012 Games
